name: Merrell
0:
”Alexa, open Merrell”
”Alexa, ask Merrell to find a trail near me”
”Alexa, ask Merrell to show me hiking trails in Grand Rapids”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: merrell
des:
We strive to inspire all people to experience the power of the trail. And we celebrate those who join us in pursuit of the rewarding experiences created when we get outside. Ask for a Trail near you or ask about our products. 

After the Welcome Message, you can say: 

"Where's a trail near me?"
"What is Merrell?"
"How do I clean my boots?"
"Check my order status"
"Contact customer service"

Be sure to check in weekly for product information and new content.
